participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Energetic and enthusiastic, Emily loves to express herself through dance and art. She is passionate about her hobbies and enjoys sharing them with others.
participant_1.background: I loove zumba. I like collectible dragon ball z figures. I love huge paintings. I like collecting rocks. I love the smell of beans.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and carefree, Oliver enjoys the finer things in life and finds joy in pampering himself. He is adventurous and loves to explore new places.
participant_2.background: I once lost a diamond at a debutante ball. I am unemployed and living off a trust fund. I like getting my nails done. I like drinking expensive wine. I own a french bulldog.

content.text: I love the smell of beans.
Me too! I love beans, they're so delicious.
I know, right? I love them in chili, soup, and tacos.
Me too! I also like them in salads.
I've never tried them in salads. What kind of salads do you put them in?
I usually put them in a salad with mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, and avocado.
That sounds delicious! I'll have to try that.
You should! It's really good.
So, what else do you like to do?
I love to go to the gym and get my nails done.
I love the gym too! I go a few times a week.
Me too! I love getting my nails done, too. It's so relaxing.
I know, right? It's the best.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a teacher.
Oh, that's cool! I'm unemployed and living off a trust fund.
That's awesome! I'm sure you have a lot of fun.
I do! I travel a lot and I love going to the spa.
That sounds amazing! I wish I could do that.
You should! You can always work as a teacher and have a trust fund too.
I'll keep that in mind!
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go to the gym, play video games, and read.
I like to go to the gym, get my nails done, and travel.
Sounds like we have a lot in common!
I think so too!
